# Pull Request Template

## Description
Brief description of what this PR accomplishes. Include links to related issues or documentation.

## Type of Change
Please delete options that are not relevant:

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Research contribution

## Related Issues
Fixes # (issue)
Closes # (issue)
Relates to # (issue)

## Changes Made
List the major changes in this PR:

- [ ] Change 1
- [ ] Change 2
- [ ] Change 3

## Testing
### Unit Tests
- [ ] Unit tests pass locally
- [ ] New unit tests added for changes
- [ ] Test coverage maintained or improved

### Integration Tests
- [ ] Integration tests pass
- [ ] API endpoints tested
- [ ] Database operations tested

### Research Validation
- [ ] Experimental results validated
- [ ] Academic reproducibility confirmed
- [ ] Statistical significance verified

### Performance Tests
- [ ] Performance benchmarks met
- [ ] No regression in performance
- [ ] Load testing completed (if applicable)

## Code Quality
### Style Guidelines
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Proper variable naming conventions
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic

### Documentation
- [ ] Code comments updated
- [ ] README updated (if necessary)
- [ ] API documentation updated
- [ ] Research documentation updated

### Security
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Input validation implemented
- [ ] Authentication/authorization verified

## Research Context
This PR contributes to our research methodology:

### Theoretical Formulation
- [ ] Advances theoretical framework
- [ ] Improves mathematical models
- [ ] Enhances algorithmic understanding

### Controlled Experimentation
- [ ] Implements experimental design
- [ ] Validates experimental results
- [ ] Improves experimental methodology

### Academic Reproducibility
- [ ] Ensures code reproducibility
- [ ] Provides complete documentation
- [ ] Enables independent validation

### Practical Application
- [ ] Implements practical solutions
- [ ] Demonstrates real-world applications
- [ ] Enables technology transfer

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published
